actions.text: Amendment SA 416 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 88.

Amendment SA 416 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S2311-2319; text: CR S2313) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to eliminate non-defense related spending by the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 416 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Coburn.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 416 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 88.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 416 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 56. Record Vote Number: 88.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to eliminate non-defense related spending by the Department of Defense.
